      • setMaxMoleculesPerGroup

        void setMaxMoleculesPerGroup(int maxMoleculesPerGroup)
        Sets the maximum number of molecules to be retrieved per group (inhibitors, activators, cofactors, drugs or bioactive). This is set for performance reasons.
        Parameters:
        maxMoleculesPerGroup - the maximum number of molecules to be retrieved.
